column2: film=''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth Anthology]]''

column1: '''Dee Bradley Baker''' (1962) is the go-to-guy when it comes to animal sounds. He is one of the most versatile and requested actors in Los Angeles.
* [[2014]]: ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]'' - Creature voices
* [[2006]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II]]'' - [[Gollum]], orcs, cattle
* [[2004]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth]]'' - Orcs, cattle
